bhauthika lakshana[sanskaranaya] jathika namal uyane bhauthika washayen kapi penena lakshana dekaki.enam pradeshaye bhumi pramanayen akkara 260 ka pramanayak pura na gas wasara miliyana 500 ka bhumiyak pura pathiruna rosa thiruwana kanda rosa thiriwana kanda rosa thiruwana kanda kandu wati 7kin sadumlana athara eya dakunu aasiyawe wishalathama rosa thiruwana kandu panthiya da we.mehidi samanya parisaraye dakina na wisheshayanta wada athu bedunu wishala na kandan sahitha na gas dakimata haki athara na pathra dalu awadhiye di raktha warnayen diswana athara parinatha wana wita di dilisena thada kola pahayen dakimata hakiwima kapi penena lakshanayaki.mehidi shri lankawe dakiya haki adi 60 ka pamana wata pramanayen yuktha wu wishalathama na gasa da mema wanaya thula daka gatha hakiya.na wanaya thula na wishesha dekak pradhana washayenma handuna gatha hakiya.enam , diya na batu na lesa eya nam kere.
